constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 103 (Thursday, June 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. SPARTZ:
H.R. 8133.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H5647]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Transparency of Hospital Billing Act
